short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Write Arweave comments to any web page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Arweave Comments lets you leave comments on any website or web content, enhancing interaction and dialogue across the internet.

Powered by the Arweave network. Users need to have Metamask extension in order to write messages. Reading is possible without it. 

Icons created by Gregor Cresnar - Flaticon
